text:
Great Company to Use

Helped build up my credit. Only thing I had a problem with was them releasing my Credit Reserve amount. Its been over 2 weeks since i paid my loan off and haven't received it yet. But overall it really helped and I would use again.
title: Great Company to Use

reply.message: Hi there, Miranda! Thank you so much for this awesome 5-star review! We're happy to know that our products and other services are able to provide assistance and help you with securing that financial stability! We do appreciate your feedback so that we may continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help makes MoneyLion ROAR! Additionally, depending on your payment method, your payoff can take up to five business days to fully process. Once your final payment clears, we will release your Credit Reserve Account funds to your selected checking account. Please note, it can take up to 10-14 days to receive the Credit Reserve Account funds once your final payment is initiated. Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of the MoneyLion.

text: Limits at 50 dollars. Dats literally almost gas money
title: Limits at 50 dollars

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: My experiences have been far from good. Only one representative out of 6 that I spoke to via chat and on the phone, on different days, was actually helpful. Nobody would listen to my issue and try different steps to solve it, but instead every single one of them repeated the same things over and over, just like the rep before them. Regardless of me telling them that I had already been through the steps they were recommending to try and solve my problem, they all basically told me that what they were saying was the only solution they had and I would just have to wait 3-5 business days to see results. Well, I waited 3-5 business day each time like they said, adding up to almost 2 months, and nothing was ever fixed, requiring me to call back or chat with them.again for hours, just to go through the same stuff over again. Finally, after all this waisted time, I was finally lucky enough to speak to somebody who wasn't reading off of a script, and he was able to resolve my issue, putting an end to all of my problems. Although I love this account and all the great benefits it offers, my experiences with customer service has made me question whether or not to keep my accounts open or not. Also their app has a bunch of glitches and problems , making it hard to actually do anything other than just check my balances each day......which takes much longer than it should. To sum it up, their customer service reps are rude and not helpful at all, the app is slow, times out constantly, fails to save changes in account information , (adding debit cards, editing payment accounts/methods, adding bank accounts/cards, and linking external accounts from other banks), and1 transfers take much longer to process than their guaranteed funding time of 3-5 business days. Also, when your bi-weekly payments for your investment account fail to process because of the app not saving your new bank card information, they will freeze your accounts and your debit card so you cannot access your money until they are able to link your new bank and set up the new card for your payments. This could take a long time.....if you read this entire review you will see that it took about 2 months to fix mine.
title: My experiences have been far from good

reply.message: We apologize to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We would like to help resolve your concerns but are unable to locate your account to reach out to you. Please use the form linked below to fill out and we will contact you directly. https://moneylioncomplaints.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
